template_description: Standard template for service_architecture.json files based on UAF definitions
purpose: Drives the accelerated expansion of the universe at the largest scales. Components: A mysterious form of energy whose nature is unknown.

interfaces.name: Dark Energy Interaction
interfaces.description: Dark energy is a hypothetical form of energy that permeates all of space and tends to accelerate the expansion of the universe. Its nature remains one of the biggest mysteries in cosmology.
interfaces.source_verification: Hypothetical - inferred from observations of cosmic expansion. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dark_energy, https://science.nasa.gov/astrophysics/focus-areas/what-is-dark-energy/
